name: Sinatra Mongoid
body:
### Simple WebApp with Ruby Sinatra Mongoid

I made this webapp in Ubuntu, for you. 
you need open two instances of the terminal

how to
======

- $ mongod 
- $ ruby app.rb
- visit localhost:port

enjoy yourself

`$ git clone ...`
